channel.title: [525] / [508] Server Restarter And Compiler
channel.description:
[u]525 / 508 Server Restarter & Compiler. V1[/u]
[IMG]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/4779/screenx.png[/img]
Hi. Im bored so I made a easy Server Restarter / Compiler for 508's and 525's.
I don't know if it works for 317's.
NOTE: Read the readme or you will get problems and the program crashs !
Your runserver.bat have to be named: run.BAT and your compiler: compile.CMD! Both files must be in 1 File with the 525restarter.exe
Like if you go into cmd there must be 3 files: compile.cmd , runserver.bat & the 525restarter.exe
Credits: Gh0stb4rrag3 - Me
If you have questions ask here.
DOWNLOAD
http://uploaded.to/file/75i9jn
DOWNLOAD[s][/s]

item.title: [525] / [508] Server Restarter And Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

I wont lie. It was really simple and basic. I was bored and im trieng to update it so everyone can set up a time when it restarts. But theres a bug, I think it restarts your client too if you click restart.

Thanks for posting btw.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2009, 07:01:16 pm[/size][hr]I had to use some complex codes for restarting it because you can’t run it twice. So you have to close it with a command and start it again.

Read full topic

I don’t know if it works for 317’s.

NOTE: Read the readme or you will get problems and the program crashs !

Your runserver.bat have to be named: run.BAT and your compiler: compile.CMD! Both files must be in 1 File with the 525restarter.exe
